_meanings:
{@--1@} Being or
produced in the north, northern
(declined like a pronoun).

{@--3@} ({%a%}) 
Later-latter, following, subsequent (<ab>opp.</ab>
{#pUrva#}); {#pUrvameGaH, uttarameGaH, °BImAMsA#};
{#uttarArDaH#} &c.; {#°rAmacaritaM#} later 
adventures of Rāma <ls>U. 1. 2</ls>; {#pUrvaH-uttaraH#} 
former-latter <ls>H. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 136.</ls> ({%b%}) 
Future, concluding; {#°kAlaH#} subsequent
time; {#°PalaM; °vacanaM#} a reply.

{@--7@} More, more
than (generally as the last member
of a <ab>comp.</ab> with numerals);  
{#zaquttarA viMSatiH#} <ls n="Mv. 2.">26</ls>; {#azwottaraM SataM#} <ls n="Mv. 2.">108.</ls>

{@--1@} Future time, futurity.
{@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. 
{@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.

{@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the daughter of 

Virāṭa and wife of Abhimanyu.

{@--3@} The last part or following 
member of a compound.

{@--9@} Result, the
chief or prevalent result or 
characteristic.

{@--10@} Excess, over and
above; see above ({#uttara#} {%<ab>a.</ab>%} 8).

an heir or claimant 
(subsequent to the death of the original
owner).

{1} the
progress of the sun to the north (of
the equator); <ls>Bg. 8. 24.</ls>

{2} the
period or time of the summer
solstice.

the upper
{#araRi#} (which by cutting becomes
the {#pramaMTa#} or churner).

for
the sake of what follows.

{1}
the upper part of the body.

a false reply, an 
indirect, evasive, or prevaricating 
reply.

the semblance of a 
reply without reality.

the regent of the northern direction,
an epithet of Kubera.

the
21st lunar mansion consisting of
three stars.

{1} more and more, higher and 
higher, further and further.

{%<ab>ind.</ab>%} higher and higher, in
constant continuation, more and
more; {#uttarottaramutkarzaH#} <ls>K. P. 10</ls>;  
{#uttarottaraM varDate#} <ls>H. 1.</ls>

the seventh book
of the Rāmāyaṇa.

the upper
part of the body; <ls>R. 9. 60.</ls>

{2} time calculated
from one full moon to another.

({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) one of the nine 
divisions of the world, the country of
the northern Kurus (said to be
a country of eternal beatitude).

the versed sine of an arc
(Wilson); the second half of the
chord halved by the versed sine
(<ls>B. and R.</ls>).

<ab>N.</ab>
of a supplementary section in the
medical work of Suśruta.

{1} Kubera, the
regent of the north.

{2} the
dark half of a lunar month.

{5} the minor proposition in
a syllogism.

{6} (in <ls>Mīm.</ls>) the fifth
member of an {%Adhikaraṇa%} <ab>q. v.</ab>

the northern way, way leading to
the north.

{1} the
last member of a compound.

{2} a
word that can be compounded with
another.

relating
to, studying, or knowing the last
word or term.

{1} a dispute, debate, a rejoinder,
retort.

the twelfth
lunar mansion consisting of two
stars (having the figure of a bed).

the 26th lunar mansion
consisting of two stars (figured
by a couch).

a loud but slow
manner of singing.

the later Mīmāṃsā,
the Vedānta philosophy, an
inquiry into the nature of Brahma
or Jñāna Kāṇḍa (distinguished
from {#mAMmAMsA#} proper which is 
usually called {#pUrvamImAMsA#}).

<ab>N.</ab> of a
celebrated drama by Bhavabhūti,
which describes the later life of
Rāma.

old age, the declining period
of life.

{2} one whose claims are of later
date than another's.

{1} the
northern altar made for the sacred 

fire.

denoted or named in reply
(as a witness).

{2} a witness deposing
to facts from the reports of others.

{1} finishing what 
remains or follows, assisting at a
ceremony.

{2} who or what proves
a reply.
